did.unittitle: National Association of Manufacturers World War I Posters
did.abstract: Thirteen World War I posters for the National Association of Manufacturers.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: National Association of Manufacturers World War I Posters #5190 G. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: Where Do You Stand? The Test of Our Loyalty is the Measure of Our Sacrifice
The Shot That Will Win The War
Agitation Which Delays Our War Industries is "Made in Germany"
Go Over the Top With the Tank That Will Win the War!
The Hand That Threatens Our Industrial Life
Our Three Lines of National Defense
United American Industry Must Back Up the Boys "Over There"
Will You Co-Operate Or Will You Obstruct!
